subtitle: Dublin bay prawns are almost like miniature lobsters with a hard shell.

method.text: Pour the cider into a large frying pan. Add the salmon, mushrooms, parsley and a little seasoning. Simmer gently for 7 min.
Add the prawns. Simmer for 3 min. Lift the salmon and prawns out. Transfer to a warmed serving dish with a fish slice.
Heat the butter in a pan. Stir in the flour and cook for 1 min. Add the reserved liquid from the frying pan. Cook for 1-2 min, stirring, until the sauce thickens slightly. Pour around the fish.

title: Dublin bay salmon and prawns
